themeWarningText: You can clear data in Auxiliary Setting to reselect a default theme. If you are in trouble, you can leave a message on the Github ISSUSE.
editStatueWarningText: In edit status will show outline border, then you can drag to change position or right click to show menu setting
siteTitleTips: Customize the title of the site, refresh the page is still effective
disabledDialogAnimationTips: On some low performance machines, you can disable popover animations to optimize performance
injectCSSPlaceholder: Please enter a valid CSS code that will be inserted into the page to override the default style
injectJSPlaceholder: Injecting JavaScript code into web pages is not recommended unless necessary, chrome extension mode is deny to inject js code
bgImgTips: The Video network path is automatically identified as a dynamic wallpaper
refreshDurationTips: You can configure periodic wallpaper refresh in seconds. If this parameter is set to 0, periodic wallpaper refresh is disabled. And min value to be 30s
refreshBtnTips: Whether to display the refresh button in the lower left corner, you can still use the right click menu for properties even if closed
positionTips1: Grid layout mode adopts layout rasterization, component size responsivenes
positionTips2: Fixed Mode will keep components in place on the screen
fixedTips2: Change offset parameters by dragging components directly in edit mode
sizeUnitTips1: PX is the unit of pixel
sizeUnitTips2: FR is a responsive unit that divides the screen into 12 parts
sizeUnitTips3: Change the Size by dragging the lower-right arrow of the component in edit mode
zIndexTips: zIndex of the material component. Try to change this value if the component is blocked
customIdTips: A component's custom ID, typically used to inject CSS or JS code operations
colorPlaceholder: Please enter a valid color value
warnLockTips: You need click lock after editing
recommendVideoTips: The following provides some recommended dynamic wallpaper options, which are from the network CDN. You can also manually enter a customized NETWORK HTTPS video path.
actionMaterialTips: The replacement materials will be reset to the default Settings, exercise caution.
clearDataTips: Data cannot be restored after being deleted. Do you want to continue?
clearDataTips1: All configured data will be saved to the browser, you can click the button below to clear all data and restore to the original state, but pay attention to the data after deletion
tabsTips: Allows users to configure multiple separate TAB pages and rename them by double-clicking the title.
tabsSwitchBtnTips: Display the toggle button at the bottom of the page
tabsKeyboardSwitchTips: Use DOWN or RIGHT key to switch to the next, this will not take effect until the page is refreshed
baseFontSizeTips: The font size of the component is based on em units.
closeClickOutsideTips: Whether the folder dialog can be closed by clicking on the outer layer
durationTips: Timer refresh duration, unit in ms
durationSecondTips: Timer refresh duration, unit in second
durationMinuteTips: Timer refresh duration, unit in minute
keyboardEventTips: Enable to press the corresponding key to jump to the bound web page
dayjsFormatterTips: Customize Dayjs format by clicking on the link below
chineseWeekDayTips: Force translate weekday text to chinese
posterTypeTips: Movie wallpaper is more suitable for landscape components, and the picture is higher clarity
clickMovieLinesActionTypeTips: Click event in movie lines text
spotlightTips: Add oval Spotlight filter to movie wallpaper image
目前暂不支持移动文件夹: Can not move folder at present
无法获取到图标，使用文字图标代替: Can not get icon, you can use text icon instead
按Tab键可快速切换搜索引擎: Press Tab key to switch next
searchConfigTips: Drag to change the engine order, or add a custom engine. Double-click the icon to edit the custom engine.
engineConfigTips1: The default search content is concatenated to the end of the engine address, which can also be used
无法识别出城市，请重新配置: Sorry, Can not get weather info for your city at present.
密钥复制成功，请在其他设备导入密钥进行配置同步: Copy success, you can import it in other device
已找到相应同步配置，配置会覆盖本地浏览器历史数据，是否继续？: Found configuration success, the configuration will overwrites the local data, confirm to continute
设别文件成功，配置会覆盖本地浏览器历史数据，是否继续？: Parse configuration success, the configuration will overwrites the local data, confirm to continute
标签页已达上限，无法添加: Can not add tabs any more
动态视频壁纸加载出错，请重试或更换视频源: Dynamic video wallpaper loading error, please try to replace.
已自动进入编辑模式，编辑模式可进行组件拖拽与右键菜单配置: You have automatically entered the edit mode, which allows you to drag and drop components and right-click menus
hiddenAddBtnTips: When you finish adding website and want to get a clear layout, you can hidden add button
雨滴特效实现失败, 请确保壁纸地址允许跨域: Rain drop effect build error, It need wallpaper url allow CORS
bgEffectSelectorTips: It based on WebGL, maybe happen error in some Low-end models or browser, need reload page after setting
glassTips: Takes effect only if the background contains transparency, based on the backdrop-filter attribute
iframeRefreshTips: Refresh time of iframe, unit in minute, set 0 to not refresh
开启后搜索的同时尝试对书签组件的数据进行搜索: Enable to find bookmark link when searching
